Interface CommentRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Comment,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Comment,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Comment,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Comment>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Comment,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CommentRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Comment,java.lang.Long>
    Holds comment's information as well as being able to discover interfaces that extend this one during classpath scanning for easy Spring bean creation.
